experience.title: System & Network Administrator
experience.description: Administered Linux (Debian, RHEL, Ubuntu) and Windows servers while maintaining internal network infrastructure, including switching, routing, and VLAN configuration. Deployed virtualized environments with Proxmox and managed Docker containers, as well as set up and maintained Kubernetes clusters both on-premise and in the cloud. Oversaw multi-cluster management using Rancher and monitored system and network performance with Zabbix. Automated workflows using Bash, Ansible, and Terraform, contributed to building an internal CI/CD pipeline with GitLab, and authored technical documentation and operating procedures.

experience.title: Web Development & IT Support

Managed professional social media accounts to enhance online presence and engagement. Deployed and maintained web applications, ensuring smooth operation and reliability. Provided comprehensive technical support across multiple levels (L1, L2, and L3), handled domain management and SSL certificate setup to secure websites, and implemented data backup and recovery solutions to safeguard information and maintain business continuity.
